mapper.select: select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, r.dtl_StepPriceDescr as step_price, r.dtl_StepPriceData as step_price_data, r.dtl_Rules as additional_clause, r.dtl_RulesData as additional_clause_data, r.dtl_MatConvRateData as material_conversion_rate_data, r.dtl_StepPriceDescr2 as step_price_desc from SCM_HX03_RO_Dtl r where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, r.SP_CODE as sp_code, c.name as sp_name, r.SP_QTY as sp_quantity, r.SP_NOTES as remark, r.SP_NO as sp_no, r.SP_AMOUNT as sp_amount from SCM_HX03_RO_SP r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join CP_HX00_SparePartHead c on r.SP_CODE=c.id where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, r.CONTACTTYPE as contact_role, r.ROLETYPE as role_type, r.CONTACTNAME as contact_name, r.CONTACTMOBILE as contact_mobile, r.DOCTYPE as ID_type, r.IDCARD as ID_number, r.IDCARDFRONT as ID_card_front_url, r.IDCARDBACK as ID_card_back_url, r.FRONTNO as frontNo, r.BACKNO as backNo, r.EXPIRYDATE as expiry_date, r.ISMATE as mobile_match_name, r.BACKNO_COPY as backNo_copy, r.STATE as network_state, r.POSTALADDRESS as postal_address, r.POSTALADDRESSID as postal_address_id, r.POSTALADDRESSNAME as postal_address_area, r.ISLEGALPERSON as legal_person, r.SIGNEMPOWERBILLID as sign_empower_billId, r.SIGNEMPOWERBILLDTLID as sign_empower_billDtlId, r.SIGNEMPOWERJSON as sign_empower_json, r.SIGNEMPOWERTYPE as sign_empower_type, r.DAKAISHOUQUANSHU as open_sign_empower from SCM_HX03_ROContactNew r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, c.code as biz_unit_code, c.name as Biz_unit_name, r.d_totalsettleamount as total_settle_amount, r.d_totalaccountamount as total_account_amount, r.d_custgrade as customer_score, r.d_afterlevel as customer_after_level, r.d_beforelevel as customer_before_level, r.d_initlevel as customer_init_level from SCM_HX03_RO13 r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join CP_HX00_BizUnit c on r.d_biz_unit=c.id where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, c.code as approval_rule_code, c.name as approval_rule_name, r.ri_rocondemand as mangage_requirement, r.ri_shoperapprove as ri_shoponwer, r.ri_shopmanage as ri_leasing_IG, r.ri_bizmanage as ri_Biz_manager, r.ri_creditapprove as ri_credit_post, r.ri_bizdirector as ri_credit_review, r.ri_selectcondition as ri_system_auto, r.ri_isaffectworkflow as ri_isaffect_approval_flow, r.ri_rocondesc as ri_control_dimension, r.ri_unlimit as ri_unlimit, r.ri_resultcheck as ri_result_check, r.ri_systemapprove as ri_system_first_trial from SCM_HX03_RO_Risk r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join CP_HX03_ROConDescribe c on r.ri_roconid=c.id where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, r.af_idcard as af_ID_number, r.af_contactname as af_contact_name, r.af_contactmobile as af_contact_infomation, c.code as sign_type_code, c.name as sign_type_name, r.af_contacttype as af_contact_type, r.af_noreceive as af_uncollected_amount, r.af_overday as af_max_overdue_days, r.af_reason as multiple_sign_reason, r.af_manager as af_manager, r.af_ig as af_IG, r.af_credit as af_credit, case when r.af_satffid=-1 then '#' else (select code from CP_HX00_Staff where id=r.af_satffid) end as af_staff_code, case when r.af_satffid=-1 then r.af_satffname else (select name from CP_HX00_Staff where id=r.af_satffid) end as af_staff_name from SCM_HX03_RO_AntiFraud r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join CP_HX02_Customer c on r.af_contractor=c.id where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, c.code as other_cost_type_code, c.name as other_cost_type_name, r.OTH_NOTES as remark, r.OTH_DTLID as other_cost_dtlId, r.OTH_DTLDESCR as em_details_line_information, r.OTH_CHARGERULS as charge_rule, r.OTH_NO as other_cost_no, r.OTH_CHARGERULSDESCR as charge_rule_desc, r.REAL_AMOUNT as real_amount, r.SD_AMOUNT as standard_amount, r.EXPLAIN as other_cost_explain, r.OTH_SRCDTLID as other_cost_track_dtlId, r.RULETYPE as rule_type, r.OTH_ITEMID as oth_itemId, r.OTH_ISCHARGERULS as include_freight from SCM_HX03_RO_Charge r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join CP_HX00_ChargeType c on r.OTH_CHARGETYPE=c.id where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, r.prj_no as pay_schedule_no, r.prj_chargetype as pay_type, r.prj_chargepercentage as pay_proportion, r.prj_chargeamount as pay_amount, r.prj_chargetimepoint as pay_point, r.prj_notes as remark, r.prj_stagestatuslink as pay_status_desc, r.prj_stagestatus as pay_status, r.prj_completetime as pay_time, r.prj_srcdtlid as pay_dtlId from SCM_HX03_RO_Prj r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid where r.billid=#{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, r.DC_COUPONNUMBER as cash_coupon_no, r.DC_COUPONNAME as cash_coupon_name, r.DC_COUPONAMOUNT as cash_coupon_amount, r.DC_SOURCEDTLID as cash_dtlld, r.DC_COUPONOVERAMOUNT as cash_coupon_over_amount from scm_hx03_ro_coupon r left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid where r.billid=#{orderId}

select * from( select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, 10 as change_type, r.rc_RO_NewStaffID as change_before, r.rc_ChangeDate as change_date, r.rc_notes as remark, o.code as update_user_code, o.name as update_user_name, r.ci_MenderTime as update_time, r.rc_RO_LasrStaffID as change_after, 1 as change_review_status from SCM_HX03_RO_RC r left join SCM_HX03_ROHead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join gp_operator o on r.rc_mender =o.id union select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, 20 as change_type, r.CONNECT_NEWSTAFFID as change_before, r.ChangeConnectDate as change_date, r.NewNote as remark, o.code as update_user_code, o.name as update_user_name, r.Change_MenderTime as update_time, r.LasrChangeStaffID as change_after, 2 as change_review_status from scm_hx03_ro_rc2 r left join SCM_HX03_ROHead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join gp_operator o on r.Change_Mender =o.id union select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, 30 as change_type, r.cp_status as change_before, r.cp_changedate as change_date, r.cp_notes as remark, o.code as update_user_code, o.name as update_user_name, r.cp_mendertime as update_time, r.cp_laststatus as change_after, r.dtl_laststatus as change_review_status from SCM_HX03_RO_CP r left join SCM_HX03_ROHead ro on r.billid=ro.billid left join gp_operator o on r.cp_mender =o.id )a where erp_id = #{orderId}

select r.billdtlid as erp_billdtl_id, r.billid as erp_id, row_number() over(partition by r.billid order by r.billdtlid) as line_number, ro.no as order_no, r.FCP_STATUS as rrs_status, r.ISLOSE as rrs_lose, r.FCP_NOTE as rrs_back_note, o.code as update_user_code, o.name as update_user_name, FCP_MENDERTIME as update_time, o.name from SCM_HX03_RO_FCP r left join gp_operator o on r.FCP_MENDER=o.id left join scm_hx03_rohead ro on r.billid=ro.billid where r.billid=#{orderId}
